title: St. Johns County firefighters respond to house fire that was possibly caused by lightning strike
description: St. Johns County Fire Rescue is responding to a house fire that was possibly caused by a lightning strike.
content:
St. Johns County Fire Rescue is responding to a house fire that was possibly caused by a lightning strike.
It happened Friday evening in the 100 block of Willow Island Point in the Silverleaf subdiv… [+698 chars]
